dashboard.label: Pre-Processing by Prediction Ability
dashboard.description: We used command analyzefields which analyses all numerical fields to determine the ability for each of those fields to predict the value of a particular field. It determines the stability of the relationship between values in the target field and numeric values in other fields.

search.query: | inputlookup LSOA_Size.csv | rename lsoa as Codes | append [| inputlookup Total_Notifiable_Offences.csv ] | append [| inputlookup aged_44.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_15.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_29.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_64.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_65plus.csv ] | append [| inputlookup all_ages.csv ] | append [| inputlookup child_poverty_percent.csv ] | append [| inputlookup happiness_coefficient.csv ] | append [| inputlookup household_income.csv | rename Code as Codes ] | append [| inputlookup school_absence.csv] | stats values(*) as * by Codes | where isnotnull(size) | eval Name=coalesce(Name,Names) | fields - Names *_2012 | analyzefields classfield=total_notifiable_offences_now | fields field balacc | eval balacc=round(balacc*100,2)| sort - balacc

panel.title: Top 5 Data Points for Total Notifiable Offences

search.query: | inputlookup LSOA_Size.csv | rename lsoa as Codes | append [| inputlookup Total_Notifiable_Offences.csv ] | append [| inputlookup aged_44.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_15.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_29.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_64.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_65plus.csv ] | append [| inputlookup all_ages.csv ] | append [| inputlookup child_poverty_percent.csv ] | append [| inputlookup happiness_coefficient.csv ] | append [| inputlookup household_income.csv | rename Code as Codes ] | append [| inputlookup school_absence.csv] | stats values(*) as * by Codes | where isnotnull(size) | eval Name=coalesce(Name,Names) | fields - Names *_2012 | analyzefields classfield=total_notifiable_offences_now | fields field balacc | eval balacc=round(balacc*100,2) | sort - balacc limit=5
